title: Provide General Event Information
description: A guest calls to ask what time the doors open for a concert tonight and what the venue's bag policy is.

tasks.description: Look up the event details for tonight's concert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the event information in the system.

tasks.description: Inform the guest that doors open at 7:00 PM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct door time.

tasks.description: Retrieve the standard venue bag policy from the knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy stating only small clear bags are allowed.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the bag policy to the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately communicates the bag size and type restrictions.
